message_1: Identify the structural isomers for the alkane C6H14 and draw their structures, also name them according to IUPAC nomenclature.
message_2:
There are five structural isomers for the alkane C6H14. Here are their IUPAC names and structures:

1. n-Hexane
   Structure: CH3-CH2-CH2-CH2-CH2-CH3

2. 2-Methylpentane
   Structure: CH3-CH(CH3)-CH2-CH2-CH3

3. 3-Methylpentane
   Structure: CH3-CH2-CH(CH3)-CH2-CH3

4. 2,2-Dimethylbutane
   Structure: CH3-C(CH3)2-CH2-CH3

5. 2,3-Dimethylbutane
   Structure: CH3-CH(CH3)-CH(CH3)-CH3

Note that the structures are represented in a linear format, but in reality, they have a three-dimensional arrangement.
